text: Nuno Miguel Bico Alves Matos (born 3 July 1994) is a Portuguese former professional cyclist, who competed professionally between 2013 and 2019 for the , , and teams. In August 2019, he was named in the startlist for the 2019 Vuelta a España. ==Major results== ;2014 : 5th Road race, National Under–23 Road Championships ;2015 : 1st 20px Road race, National Under–23 Road Championships ;2016 : 3rd Road race, National Under–23 Road Championships : 7th Overall Volta ao Alentejo : 7th Liège–Bastogne–Liège Espoirs ===Grand Tour general classification results timeline=== {| class="wikitable plainrowheaders" |- ! scope="col" | Grand Tour ! scope="col" | 2019 |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A pink jersey Giro d'Italia |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A yellow jersey Tour de France |— |- style="text-align:center;" ! scope="row" | alt=A red jersey Vuelta a España |153 |} {| class="wikitable" |+ Legend |- ! scope="row" | — | Did not compete |- ! scope="row" | DNF | Did not finish |} ==References== ==External links== * Category:1994 births Category:Living people Category:Portuguese male cyclists Category:Vuelta a España cyclists
title: Nuno Bico
